title: Dedication to Venus Equestris
support: A limestone tympanum from a small aedicola. The left and right ends of the tympanum have been sawn off at a later date (the block was re-used as a threshold in a mediaeval structure. The upper and lower cornice have been damaged. The inscription runs below the lower cornice. The framed pediment of the tympanum is empty.

date._: 39—36 BCE (on the reasonable assumption that this is the same office-holder as

provenanceFound._: Excavated 2 February 2005 in area immediately to east of the church of S. Giovanni Battista on Capo Boeo

provenanceObserved._: observed on display 2023, no formal autopsy
